QuestData.Title: All That Skitters
QuestData.Description: There's somethin' I've noticed up there... Jintha'Alor's full of spiders. Small ones about as big as yer hand. Not an unusual sight for the Hinterlands, but somethin's amiss.$B$BTo be honest, I don't trust the trolls to keep pets. They're up to somethin'. I need you to bring me some of those spiders. Keep 'em alive if you can, and we'll see what the spirits tell me...
QuestData.RewardText: By Kurdan's beard... these don't look like any spiders I've seen before. Dark magic's at work here.
